fields.name: Bleve
fields.description: Bleve is a full-text search and indexing library for Go.

fields.name: Lucene
fields.description: Apache Lucene is a high-performance, full-featured text search engine library written entirely in Java.

fields.name: Whoosh
fields.description: Whoosh is a fast, featureful full-text indexing and searching library implemented in pure Python.

fields.name: Ferret
fields.description: Ferret is a super fast, highly configurable search library written in Ruby.

fields.name: Solr
fields.description: Solr is an open source enterprise search platform, written in Java, from the Apache Lucene project.

fields.name: Elasticsearch
fields.description: Elasticsearch is a search engine based on Lucene, written in Java.

fields.name: Blast
fields.description: Blast is a full-text search and indexing server written in Go, built on top of Bleve.
